resources.string: KeyLocks
Choose a memorable pass-phrase from the list
Tap your chosen passphrase. Move the slider for a new selection of longer or shorter passphrases
Less secure, easier
More secure, harder
There has been an error, OOPS!
Make sure you are in private for the this stage. Press "start" to continue and "hide" if you are disturbed
Now you must commit your passphrase to memory.
Your passphrase is used to activate your private Key, which is kept securely on this device
When you are happy that you can remember your passphrase, press "next"
Now see if you can remember your passphrase - enter it below.
